page.title: 14LEISURE IN SLOUGH
page.content: At Montem there is a lot to do. It has: squash courts, two swimming pools, pool hall, indoor football, netball, badminton & basketball courts, table tennis, trampolining, volleyball, karate, judo, aikido. It is quite cheap to go swimming, about 70p. At the moment they are building an ice-rink by the side of Montem. At Baylis outdoor swimming pool, it is very pleasant with a large pool and a baby pool. The larger one has two high diving boards. In the smaller one, a slide goes into the pool,with a playground next to it. To get in costs about 35p. At Salt Hill there are tennis courts and a club. You can play on grass courts for Â£2 and free on concrete. There is a new tennis school where there is all year professional coaching for Â£5/hour.
